title: Deals of the day-Mergers and acquisitions
text:
Deals of the day-Mergers and acquisitions

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 25, 2019 00:43)

© Reuters. Deals of the day-Mergers and acquisitions (Adds ENI , IREN) Oct 24 (Reuters) - The following bids, mergers, acquisitions and disposals were reported by 1330 GMT on Thursday: ** Italy-based energy company Eni has bought 70% of Edison's stake in Block 12 of the offshore Habi gas concession in Egypt's eastern Mediterranean, an official at state-owned Egyptian gas company EGAS said. Italy-based utility company IREN will submit a non-binding offer for the assets of waste management company Unieco Holding Ambiente, the chief executive of IREN said. Printing and technology services provider CSG Ltd said it received an offer from Japan's Fuji Xerox (NYSE: ) Co worth A$139.3 million ($95.46 million). Banking firm Rothschild struck its second British takeover deal within months with the acquisition of boutique financial advisory firm Livingstone.

Deals of the day-Mergers and acquisitions
